MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Laurieston affecting properties in Old Redding Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site and, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15pm this is to safely complete the final repair on an underground cable fault. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.47pm on Wednesday 28th April 2021.
